name: Tylenol (Acetaminophen)
usage: Take 1-2 tablets every 4-6 hours as needed for pain or fever
explanation: Acetaminophen is a pain reliever and fever reducer. It works by blocking certain natural substances in your body that cause pain and fever.

name: Aspirin
usage: Take 1-2 tablets every 4-6 hours with food
explanation: Aspirin is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) that reduces pain, fever, and inflammation. Not recommended for children under 12 due to risk of Reye's syndrome.

name: Ibuprofen (Advil)
usage: Take 1-2 tablets every 4-6 hours with food
explanation: Ibuprofen is an NSAID that reduces pain, fever, and inflammation. Safe for children over 6 months when used as directed.

name: Benadryl (Diphenhydramine)
usage: Take 1-2 tablets every 4-6 hours for allergy symptoms
explanation: Diphenhydramine is an antihistamine that relieves allergy symptoms like sneezing, runny nose, and itchy eyes. May cause drowsiness.

name: Zyrtec (Cetirizine)
usage: Take 1 tablet daily for allergy relief
explanation: Cetirizine is a non-drowsy antihistamine that provides 24-hour relief from allergy symptoms. Safe for children over 2 years.

name: Claritin (Loratadine)
usage: Take 1 tablet daily for allergy relief
explanation: Loratadine is a non-drowsy antihistamine that provides 24-hour relief from seasonal and year-round allergies.

name: Pepto-Bismol
usage: Take 2 tablets every 30-60 minutes as needed
explanation: Bismuth subsalicylate relieves upset stomach, diarrhea, and heartburn. Contains salicylate, similar to aspirin.

name: Tums (Calcium Carbonate)
usage: Take 2-4 tablets as needed for heartburn
explanation: Calcium carbonate neutralizes stomach acid to relieve heartburn and acid indigestion. Also provides calcium supplement.

name: Robitussin DM
explanation: Combination cough suppressant and expectorant. Dextromethorphan suppresses cough while guaifenesin thins mucus.

name: Sudafed (Pseudoephedrine)
explanation: Pseudoephedrine is a decongestant that shrinks blood vessels in the nasal passages to relieve congestion.
